typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as integer,
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		id as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SouthridgeCatalogRawOutput
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> FourthCoffeeActorsRaw
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieActor
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieOnlineMovieRaw
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as integer,
		ReleaseDate as date 'MM-dd-yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> VanArsdelMovieRawOutput
SouthridgeCatalogRawOutput foldDown(unroll(actors),
	mapColumn(
		ActorName = actors.name,
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title,
		id,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenForMultipleActors
SouthridgeCatalogDervivedCols select(mapColumn(
		ActorName,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate = availabilityDate,
		Genre = genre,
		Rating = rating,
		TheatricalReleaseYear = releaseYear,
		RunTimeMinutes = RuntimeMinutes,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate = streamingAvailabilityDate,
		Title = title,
		SourceSystemMovieID = id,
		SouthridgeMovieID = id,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNeededCols
FlattenForMultipleActors derive(RuntimeMinutes = toInteger(runtime),
		GlobalMovieID = uuid(),
		SourceSystemID = "southridge") ~> SouthridgeCatalogDervivedCols
FourthCoffeeMovieActor, FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw join(FourthCoffeeMovieActor@MovieID == FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMovieActorToMovie
JoinMovieActorToMovie, FourthCoffeeActorsRaw join(FourthCoffeeMovieActor@ActorID == FourthCoffeeActorsRaw@ActorID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMovieActorandMovietoActor
JoinMovieActorandMovietoActor, FourthCoffeeMovieOnlineMovieRaw join(FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieOnlineMovieRaw@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInOnlineMovieID
JoinInOnlineMovieID derive(SourceSystemID = "fourthcoffee",
		GlobalMovieID = uuid()) ~> FourthCoffeeDervivedCols
